long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make donations to effectively run charities effortlessly and at zero cost.

Browsing For Change has curated a selection of effectively run charities and grouped them into categories. Make selections based on the categories that you care most about. As you accumulate tabs throughout the day, Browsing For Change will serve you a blog with advertisements on it and monetize your new tabs by doing so. At the end of each month, Browsing For Change will track your activity and make donations to the charities you have opted to contribute to on your behalf.
